name: Scizor
description: The Pincer Pokémon. Scizor has a body with the hardness of steel. It is not easily fazed by ordinary sorts of attacks. This Pokémon flaps its wings to regulate its body temperature.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Light Metal
abilities.description: This Pokémon is especially light for its species. Once per long rest, it may impose disadvantage on an attack roll against it.
